name: Breast Cancer
description: A type of cancer that forms in the cells of the breasts, typically in the ducts or lobules.

name: Prostate Cancer
description: Cancer that occurs in the prostate gland, which produces seminal fluid that nourishes and transports sperm.
symptoms: {difficulty urinating,decreased force of urination,blood in semen,discomfort in pelvic area}

name: Colorectal Cancer
description: Cancer that starts in the colon or rectum, often beginning as polyps that develop into cancer over time.
symptoms: {change in bowel habits,rectal bleeding,persistent abdominal discomfort,fatigue,weight loss}

name: Lung Cancer
description: Cancer that begins in the lungs and may spread to lymph nodes or other organs in the body.

name: Acute Myeloid Leukemia
description: A type of cancer of the blood and bone marrow with too many immature white blood cells.
symptoms: {fatigue,fever,bone pain,shortness of breath,easy bruising and bleeding}
